item.title: Steve Bannon set for New York trial starting Feb. 25, judge rules

item.description: The much-hyped fight pitting the 58-year-old Tyson against Paul, 27, shattered records but was marred by tech glitches.

item.title: Famed ballet dancer dies in fall from balcony in Russia
item.description: Ballet dancer Vladimir Shklyarov fell from a fifth-floor balcony after taking painkillers ahead of back surgery, Russian media reported.

item.title: Trump confirms plan to declare national emergency, use military for mass deportations
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is emphasizing his plan to declare a national emergency to carry out his campaign promise of mass deportations.
